poem:
### A Dialogue of Shadows

Beyond the headlines' clash,  
two shadows dance, unseen,  
in corridors of power.  
Words like leaves in fall,  
scatter—brash, bold, brittle.  
Yet the earth stays silent,  
a deep loam awaiting  
a seed of thought  
to root beyond  
the noise of men.  
Alone, the world spins on.
